title: GR ready to resign if Party Leaders request, Speaker informs: Sajith
body_lines: Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardene had informed party leaders that President Gotabaya Rajapaksa is ready to resign if they make such a request, Leader of Opposition Sajith Premadasa told Parliament today.
Mr. Premadasa said the Speaker came up with this information during the party leaders meeting which was called by the Speaker this morning. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
